availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Luisa Walker. Father of Susan Walker, Mary Walker, Lucy A. Walker, Margaret Walker, Sarah Walker, John Walker, Lance Walker, William Walker, Champ Walker, and James Walker.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, stamped p. 475. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 96. Find A Grave, "David Walker (1808-1894)," Memorial #32563039, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=32563039&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
